fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may trick players negatively targeting you this night into another player. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can redirect multiple attacks in one night.
- Any attackers you redirect will be notified of being tricked, negative effect users will not be notified.
- You learn what negative effects you redirected.
- Roleblock Immune.
